title: Homestead National Monument of America: Indoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Indoor Activities               Indoor Activities        Visitors explore the exhibits at the Heritage Center. Homestead National Monument of America   Â    The complex homesteading story ispresented at the Homestead Heritage Center and Education Center. The 1867 Palmer-Epard Cabin is located just outside the Heritage Center. The Freeman School serves as a reminder of the role the schoolhouse played in the history of settlement on the prairie.
